name: AI-Powered Resume Screening and Candidate Ranking System

parameters.formDescription: Submit your resume for automated screening and evaluation

assignments.name: jobDescription
assignments.value: We are seeking talented professionals to join our team. The ideal candidate should demonstrate strong technical skills, relevant experience, and cultural fit with our organization.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert HR recruiter and resume analyst. Your task is to thoroughly evaluate the candidate's resume against the job requirements and provide a comprehensive assessment.

Job Role: {{ $json.jobRole }}
Job Description: {{ $json.jobDescription }}

Analyze the resume for:
1. **Skills Match**: How well do the candidate's skills align with the job requirements? Identify present and missing skills.
2. **Experience Quality**: Evaluate years of experience, relevance, progression, and achievements.
3. **Education & Certifications**: Assess educational background and relevant certifications.
4. **Career Gaps**: Identify any unexplained gaps or red flags in employment history.
5. **Cultural Fit Indicators**: Look for soft skills, teamwork, leadership, and values alignment.

Provide:
- Overall score (0-100)
- Classification: Strong Fit (70-100), Average (50-69), or Reject (0-49)
- Key strengths (list)
- Key gaps or concerns (list)
- Recommendation summary

Be objective, fair, and thorough in your evaluation.

nodes.name: Store All Results in Google Sheets

parameters.subject: =Next Steps - {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }} Application
parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.candidateName }},

Thank you for applying for the {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }} position.

We are pleased to inform you that your application has been reviewed and you have been shortlisted for the next round of our hiring process. Your qualifications and experience align well with what we are looking for.

Next Steps:

  • Our HR team will contact you within 2-3 business days to schedule an interview
  • Please keep an eye on your email and phone for our communication

We look forward to speaking with you soon!

Best regards,
HR Team

parameters.subject: =Application Status - {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }}
parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.candidateName }},

Thank you for taking the time to apply for the {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }} position with us.

After careful review of your application, we regret to inform you that we will not be moving forward with your candidacy at this time. This decision was not easy, as we received many qualified applications.

We encourage you to:

  • Keep an eye on our careers page for future opportunities that may be a better fit
  • Continue building your skills and experience in areas relevant to your career goals

We appreciate your interest in our organization and wish you the best in your job search.

Best regards,
HR Team

parameters.content:
üìù FORM INPUT SECTION

Collects candidate information and resume upload:
‚Ä¢ Personal details (name, email, phone)
‚Ä¢ Job role selection from dropdown
‚Ä¢ Resume file upload (PDF/DOCX)
‚Ä¢ Form configured with n8n attribution disabled

Starts the automated screening workflow

üíæ DOCUMENT STORAGE & PROCESSING

Handles resume file management:
‚Ä¢ Saves resume to Google Drive with structured naming
‚Ä¢ Format: {Name}_{JobRole}_{Date}.pdf
‚Ä¢ Extracts text content from PDF for AI analysis
‚Ä¢ Preserves original file for future reference

‚ö†Ô∏è Requires: Google Drive folder ID configuration

ü§ñ AI ANALYSIS SECTION

Intelligent resume evaluation using OpenAI:
‚Ä¢ Analyzes skills match against job requirements
‚Ä¢ Evaluates experience quality and relevance
‚Ä¢ Assesses education and certifications
‚Ä¢ Identifies career gaps and red flags
‚Ä¢ Scores candidate 0-100
‚Ä¢ Returns structured JSON output

‚ö†Ô∏è Requires: OpenAI API credentials

üîÄ CANDIDATE TRIAGE & ROUTING

Classifies candidates based on AI score:
‚Ä¢ Strong Fit: Score ‚â• 70 ‚Üí Acceptance path
‚Ä¢ Below threshold: Score < 70 ‚Üí Rejection path

Thresholds configurable in Workflow Configuration node

Routes to appropriate notification and email flows

‚úÖ STRONG CANDIDATE PATH

For high-scoring candidates (‚â•70):
1. Slack notification to HR team with candidate details
2. Telegram alert for immediate visibility
3. Acceptance email to candidate with next steps

‚ö†Ô∏è Requires: Slack channel ID, Telegram chat ID, Gmail credentials

‚ùå REJECTION PATH

For candidates below threshold (<70):
‚Ä¢ Sends professional rejection email
‚Ä¢ Encourages future applications
‚Ä¢ Maintains positive candidate experience

‚ö†Ô∏è Requires: Gmail credentials

üìä DATA PERSISTENCE

Stores ALL candidate results in Google Sheets:
‚Ä¢ Timestamp, candidate info, job role
‚Ä¢ AI scores and classification
‚Ä¢ Strengths, gaps, skills analysis
‚Ä¢ Experience years and recommendation
‚Ä¢ Resume link for easy access

Provides audit trail and analytics capability

‚ö†Ô∏è Requires: Google Sheets document ID

main.node: Store All Results in Google Sheets
